casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Appellee, v. John A. HATLEY, Defendant-Appellant. No. 8353. Circuit Court of Appeals, Third Circuit. Argued Oct. 5, 1943. Decided Oct. 12, 1943. Harry Unger, of Newark, N. J., for appellant. Edgar H. Rossbach, of Newark, N. J., (Charles M. Phillips, U. S. Atty., of Trenton, N. J., on the brief), for appellee.

Before BIGGS, JONES, and GOODRICH, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
